message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I believe it will be incredibly beneficial for you. My initial offer is $22,000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $18,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
Bob, I understand your desire to save, but my offer reflects the true value of this product.  I could come down to $20,000.  This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $17,500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
Bob, I'm trying to be flexible, but I need to be fair to myself as well. $19,000 is the lowest I can go. It's a fantastic deal for a product of this caliber.
I understand your concerns, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $17,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
